channel.title: Beci Lambrecht on Rotational Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Beci Lambrecht on Rotational Labs

item.title: Three Strategies for Tech Startups with Heart
item.description: Working at a startup is an exciting challenge, an opportunity for growth, and not for the faint of heart. Here are a few things that currently resonate with our team, immersed as we are in that startup life.

item.title: Everything I Know About Project Management I Learned From Cattle Ranching
item.description: If you think farmwork and software don’t have much in common, think again!
